channel.description: Recent content in tool on Rui Zhou

item.title: Git Commands in Usage
item.description: Overview Update website Using Hugo to set personal website has some issues about Git to attention. Source code and website code are independent. Category Source code Website Code Creation Manually Automatically File type .md .html Usage Edit the Content Display the Information Folder hugo root public Therefore, we need to develop the source code firstly, and push it to git.

item.title: Photoshop Tips
item.description: Create the dynamic picture 导入图片 File -> 设置图片大小（宽500px） 打开时间轴控件 逆向并设置时间 设置过度（每张1秒，间隔20张） 存储为网页可识别
